Megatron looks at Astroblasts radar, "Cyclonus, Scourge, we need some ariel
back up. Take out the robots on our tail, then join us here in outer space".

Megatron then gets off, and pushes Switchblade out of the way. "We dont
have time, come, quickly quickly". He walks into the ark, and looks around.


OOC: Can someone tell us what we see please.
